columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: PARENT_TRANS_LINE_GID

columns.description: Marks the condition or state of the GTM trade transaction line using colors.

columns.name: PRECEDING_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID
